
h1. Upload a Process



Besides the three default processes supported by the system, Administrators also can upload new processes for using by following guides:

1\. Access the *Business Process Admin* page on the *Navigation* bar.


!MainNew.png!


*Admin Workflow Management* will appear:


!AdminWorkflowManagement.png!


2. Open the *Upload process* form by clicking the button !UploadProcessButton.png!


!UploadProcessForm.png!


3. Enter a name for the uploaded process in the *Name* field.

4. Browse to the location that contains a code of a new process by clicking the *Browse* button and then click the *Upload* icon next to this button to upload that process.

5. Save the uploaded process by clicking the *Save* button.
